content:
Hybras said:

Hi, I'm new to zulip and this is kinda overwhelming.
I set up a github workflow to publish ra to Open VSX. I'd like to claim the matklad namespace to prevent other publishers (for example there's already a nightly/dev version that seems broken). I'm here to ask permission to do so. I have no idea who to formally ask or where!

So gitpod.io runs Eclipse Theia which gets extensions from Open VSX?
